name: .VRPACKAGE File Extension
summary: Learn about .VRPACKAGE files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A VRPACKAGE file is a Zip-compressed VR scene package exported from SimLab Composer or SimLab VR Viewer. It contains information about a VR Scene and its resource files, which include images, objects, annotations, lighting effects, and the starting position of the viewer in the scene.

content: The VRPACKAGE format is designed to provide an immersive viewing experience that allows the viewer to step into a 3D scene when opened with a VR application and compatible device. A VR scene may be used for various purposes, such as mechanical training, architectural tours, and previewing products.
NOTE: To create a VRPACKAGE file with SimLab Composer, create a scene, select File → Export, then choose the "SimLab VR Package" format from the dropdown menu.

instructions: You can open VRPACKAGE files with SimLab Composer (Windows and macOS). To open the file, select File → Open. You can also open VRPACKAGE files with SimLab VR Viewer (multiplatform) and SimLab AR/VR Viewer (Android and iOS).

Since VRPACKAGE files are compressed with Zip compression you can open them with a Zip utility and directly access the files that make up the virtual reality scene. To do this, rename the .vrpackage file extension to .zip, then open it with a Zip utility.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
